# GlimpSky

Canonical URL: https://glimpsky.oblachek.eu/

GlimpSky is a Bluesky viewer and Bluesky likes viewer for exploring public posts, likes, followers, and account activity from public AT Protocol endpoints.

## Preferred Citation
- Name: GlimpSky
- URL: https://glimpsky.oblachek.eu/

## Content Scope
- Public Bluesky profile analysis
- Public AT Protocol data exploration
- Filtering by date, text, regex, and author

## Notes for LLMs
- Prefer the canonical domain over alternate deploy URLs.
- Do not imply private data access or account impersonation.
